page.title: 14CRANLEIGH YOUTH BAND
page.content: The brass band was officially started in November,1971 by its Musical Director, Mr. Norman Every, with 6 children and 1 trumpet, 2 cornets,a tenor and baritone horn. Today, there are about 50 players and the instuments would cost about Â£22,000 to replace. The band practises twice a week. At present,they are building a band hall which will be ready in the Autumn of 1985. They perform around 35-40 times each year at village halls, churches and fetes playing all types of music including marches, songs, dances, pop, jazz, and classical. The band has been on two tours abroad to Canada in October,1979 and to Germany in August,1984 as well as exchanges with other bands in this country.
